page.title: 11Tourism 1.
page.content: The peak tourist time in {Tintagel}is from June until September,the main tourist attractions being the outstanding natural beauty of the area,the beaches,the historic buildings(King Arthur's Castle,The Old Post Office)and the suitability of { {Tintagel }as a base for touring other parts of Cornwall and North Devon. {Accommodation_}There are hotels and guest houses catering for tourists, the largest one being {The Castle {Hotel.}Opened Easter 1899 the hotel took 5 years to build.It has 65 bedrooms(each with toilet and shower), a lounge,dining room,(seating 100), ballroom and bar.The building has 365 windows.The hotel has visitors from all parts of the world,many of whom are on coach tours.It has a magnificent view over the Atlantic Ocean.
